title: Coffee Shop Customization!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Brr~ It’s so cold today! Mari-san, whatcha gonna order?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Hmmm...... Maybe a latte? What about you, Honoka?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>I’ll get a hot cocoa~ But I’m gonna ask for a different syrup.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>A different syrup?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>That’s right. It’s fun to change up the flavor~ I’m gonna try tea syrup today.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ah, that sounds good. It’ll spice it up. Reminds me of Christmas.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It reminds you of Christmas?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Well, you eat gingerbread cookies during Christmas, right? You also add different kinds of spices in addition to ginger when you bake it. That’s why it reminded me of Christmas.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>You’re right. I love Christmas! Until the Christmas season is over, I’m gonna ask for tea syrup every time!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>I’ll do the same! We can start celebrating early!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
